snippet.title: Foregone - Reveal Trailer | E3 2019 (PC)
snippet.description:
Foregone - Reveal Trailer | E3 2019

Foregone is a combat-focused action-platformer that combines the challenging gameplay of Diablo and Dark Souls with fluid pixel animation popularized by Dead Cells. Take control of a powerful Arbiter charged with keeping the peace at all costs as you shoot, slash, and stab your way through hordes of corrupted monsters. Slay your enemies before they slay you, or you’ll soon be facing them all over again.
